item.title: How to Perform the EA FC 25 Block Glitch
item.description:
An EA Sports FC 25 bug is allowing players to bypass the set piece distance threshold and simply block the shots of their opponents. For players wondering how they can exploit this EA Sports FC 25 glitch, here is what they need to know.

It is highly discouraged to exploit this bug in PvP mode, as it is technically against the rules of football and is an unethical way of gaining an advantage over opponents.

In soccer, there is a distance opponent players need to maintain when a set piece, which includes corner kicks, free kicks, goal kicks, and penalties, is being taken. This distance is a circle of radius of 10 yards or 9.15m, and it is usually denoted by the referee. In EA Sports FC 25 , there is an invisible barrier that enforces this rule. So when an opponent is taking a set piece, a player will not be able to get closer than 10 yards from the opponent.

How to Perform the EA FC 25 Block Glitch

Due to a glitch, players can bypass this invisible barrier in EA Sports FC 25 . To do that, players will first need to start running towards the opponent who is taking the set piece. Right before they are about to cross the invisible barrier, they will need to press the R1 button (RB on Xbox) on their controller . This will allow them to bypass the barrier altogether, and they will be able to get as close as they want to the opponent. It is crucial to note that players should press the key before they cross the invisible barrier, or else this trick will not work at all. Once again, players should avoid using it in PvP mode, especially competitive modes in EA Sports FC 25 like Ultimate Team.

The Player's Direction

Another thing to note is that once players start exploiting this glitch, they will not be able to change the direction of their player. That is, the player will keep running in the same direction as they were before entering the barrier. Therefore, one should position the player in the right direction toward the opponent before crossing the barrier. The best way to use this glitch is to go directly in front of the opponent who is taking the set piece, as it will simply block their shots altogether. In fact, this also works for goal kicks, so one can use it as an offensive tactic in EA Sports FC 25 as well. That being said, considering this is pretty much a game-breaking bug, it is quite likely that the developers will fix it pretty soon.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption 2: 7 Things To Do In Your First Hours Of Gameplay
item.description:
Red Dead Redemption 2 is filled with tons of re-playable content that keeps players engaged for hours. The immersive, open-world map, NPC interactions, and the beauty of Arthur Morgan keep players entertained and wanting more. When players first dive into Red Dead Redemption 2 , Rockstar Games provides a complete rundown of the character and the mechanics that are to be experienced within.

The main goal is having the most money, the best horse, and knowing how to take down an enemy, but achieving this doesn't always come easy. Knowing which tips, tricks, and essential moves might get players there a bit faster. Here are seven things every player must do in their first hours of gameplay to make the most of that early gameplay experience.

7 Explore The Major Parts Of The Map

Get Familiar With Points Of Interest

  • Discover secret treasures, hiding spots, camps, and easter eggs
  • Unlock map regions, and stranger and side missions
  • Explore each region and become familiar with the challenges

The world of Red Dead Redemption 2 is filled with life. From wild animals roaming around to strangers needing a ride, there are countless points of interest to keep players entertained for hours. As players explore the map, be sure to unlock map regions, and explore large areas on the map to make them playable for Arthur Morgan.

Becoming familiar with these large areas will help players learn the secret hiding spots, campsites, best hunting areas, and points of interest in each region, making players ready for even the toughest challenge.

6 Learn To Loot

Loot Every Single Enemy For Ammunition, Provisions, and Money

  • Looting enemies will help players get valuables and collectibles quickly
  • Items can be sold for money
  • Loot to stock up on craftable items instead of buying them later on

Coming from a loot goblin, looting is essential in Red Dead Redemption 2 . Looting enemies is a quick and efficient way to acquire valuable items and collectibles without having to search for hours or spend a big buck.

From weapons and ammunition to money and resources, there's always something to be gained from fallen foes. Remember, looted items can be sold for money or used to craft essential items, saving players time and resources in the long run. Make it a habit to search every enemy encountered, and players will be well-equipped for traveling the land.

5 Bond With A Horse

A Loyal Horse Makes For a Valuable Companion With Extra Perks

  • Improve horse performance to increase speed, stamina, and health
  • Unlock special abilities, quick turns, jumps, etc
  • Make for a loyal, well-tamed horse by Arthur Morgan's side

A good horse makes for a good companion. Base game unlockable horses may not pack a punch, but bonding with the horse will make for better speed, stamina, and health. Investing time and effort into bonding makes it quicker to unlock the full potential of the horse.

Groom the horse regularly, feed it well, and take it on adventures to strengthen the connection. A well-trained and bonded horse can significantly enhance the gameplay experience, providing valuable assistance in combat, exploration, and travel.

4 Practice Mastering Dead Eye

For a Steady, Accurate Shot Against Animals And Enemies

  • Slow down time to take a precise, slow-motion shot against enemies or while hunting
  • Practice to prioritize abilities and become a master gunslinger
  • Use Dead Eye strategically to escape dangerous situations

Dead Eye is a powerful ability in Red Dead Redemption 2 that allows players to slow down time and target enemies with deadly accuracy. Mastering Dead Eye is essential for success in combat and can help players overcome any challenging situation.

By practicing early on in the game and experimenting with different aiming techniques, players can become proficient in using Dead Eye to their advantage, whether it's taking out multiple enemies at once or catching a 3-star animal kill. Practice using Dead Eye in these different scenarios, experiment with different aiming techniques and pound out multiple shots in Dead Eye to maximize effectiveness while using it. With enough practice, players will become masters of Dead Eye and a formidable force on the frontier, fast.

3 Get A Solid Arsenal

Having the Right Guns Compliments the Right Gameplay

  • Head to the store and buy a solid, strong gun ready to challenge any enemy or animal
  • Upgrade your weapons: As players progress through the game, weapons can be upgraded to improve performance
  • After the first fight, clean the gun with gun oil to improve efficiency

Guns aren't easy to unlock as a new player, but a well-equipped arsenal is crucial for survival in the Wild West. As you progress through Red Dead Redemption 2 , be sure to upgrade weapons to improve their performance and experiment with different types of firearms to find the ones that suit players' playstyle.

A solid arsenal, or at least one favorite pistol, will give players the tools needed to take on any challenge, from hunting to defending the camp against bandits and lawmen.

2 Store The Correct Gear

Be Prepared For Any Challenge, Including the Weather

  • Equip the right gear for different situations: Equip the appropriate gear for different activities, such as hunting, fishing, or combat
  • Have one outfit for hot weather and a jacket for cold weather stored in the saddle
  • Be sure to stock up on meats, canned goods, and veggies for long travels and top-ups

In the unpredictable lands of Red Dead Redemption 2 , players may find themselves fighting a bear in the snow or wrestling an alligator in the swamp. Being prepared for any weather condition is essential for survival. Equipping the right gear for different activities and having one outfit ready for hot weather and one for cold storage in the saddle is crucial for gameplay from the beginning of the game.

Players should immediately stock up on meats, canned goods, and veggies for long travels and quick energy boosts. By planning ahead and staying prepared, players will be better equipped to face the challenges of the wild frontier.

1 Progress Through the Story at Your Own Pace

Fully Engage In Everything Arthur Morgan's Story Has To Offer

  • Advance the story: Completing missions will advance the main story and unlock new regions and content
  • Earn rewards: Completing missions players with money, XP experience, and even gold nuggets
  • Red Dead Redemption 2 has a rich and engaging story, take the time to appreciate all it has to offer

To truly experience the full depth of Red Dead Redemption 2 , actively participate in all aspects of the game. Completing missions early on will advance the main storyline, unlocking new regions and content for players. Better guns, better horses, better outfits, and better experiences. Along the way, players will earn rewards such as money, XP, and even gold nuggets.

Taking the time to appreciate the intricate storytelling, compelling characters, and immersive open-world is what makes this game a truly unforgettable experience from the very beginning. Saddle up, explore the map and embark on a journey with these tips and tricks to tackle the challenges of the most loved cowboy franchise and enjoy all of the Red Dead Redemption 2 experience.

item.title: Pokemon GO Bug Makes it Impossible to Catch New Pokemon
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Dynamax Falinks catch screen is glitched, preventing players from catching it after raids.
  • Max Raids are bug-ridden, with white screens preventing catches despite using Max Particles.
  • Players advised to avoid Dynamax Raids for now due to bugs, focus on leveling up Max Moves.

A new Pokemon GO bug is making it impossible for players to catch Dynamax Falinks, as the screen turns white after the raid, and there is no option to catch it at all. Dynamax Falinks debuted as part of three-star Max Battles on October 1st in Pokemon GO , but it seems like players will need to wait until the bug is fixed to catch the Pokemon.

The debut of the Dynamax feature in Pokemon GO has been a bumpy ride so far. While fans were quite excited to see the arrival of a new mechanic, several issues came along with it. For instance, players were frustrated with Pokemon GO crashing during Beldum Max Raids, and the cost of the battle made things even worse. Meanwhile, a new set of Max Raids recently debuted in Pokemon GO , and it seems like they are bug-ridden as well.

In a new post on the Silph Road subreddit, user Kiwi1234567 highlights a frustrating bug that players have been facing in Max Battles in Pokemon GO . Apparently, when players try to catch a Dynamax Falinks after defeating it in a raid, the screen turns completely white. It should be noted that players do get the rewards for the battle, and the raid is counted as completed; however, the catch screen does not seem to be working in the game at this time.

Pokemon GO Players Should Avoid Max Raids for the Time Being

What makes things worse is the fact that Max Particles are still consumed for the battle, despite players being unable to catch the Pokemon. Fans noted that they downloaded the latest update and assets, which Niantic had earlier notified about, but that doesn't seem to fix the issue. Additionally, players have noted that almost all Pokemon GO Power Spots have turned into Falinks Max Raids, and there is no sight of the Galar starters, namely Grookey, Scorbunny, and Sobble, at all. Considering that all Falinks Max Raids are bugged right now, it seems like players should avoid Dynamax Raids altogether for the time being. Fans are not happy with the current state of the game, but they are expecting that a fix will be rolled out soon.

As far as the Falinks Raid itself goes, players will need to go all out in the battle, as it is reportedly much harder than the Beldum Max Raid in Pokemon GO . So far, the go-to strategy seems to be using Dynamax Charizard in Pokemon GO for the Falinks Raid, as it appears to be much more effective than Dynamax Metagross. Until the Max Raids are fixed, players can focus on leveling up their Max Moves, as they play a crucial role in the battle.

item.title: PSN Is Currently Down
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • PlayStation Network is currently down, affecting online services, prompting frustration among players.
  • Recent outages in 2024 follow similar disruptions in April and July, limiting gameplay once again.
  • Players hope Sony resolves the issue soon to resume gaming, possibly resorting to offline games in the meantime.

Numerous players have reported that the PlayStation Network is currently down, rendering online services unavailable. This information has been confirmed by Sony, which is currently looking into the PlayStation Network issue.

PlayStation outages aren't too common, thankfully, though players may be frustrated to see another one in 2024. One of the last major PSN outages was earlier this year in July, with others preceding it in April and March.

Sony is Aware of the PlayStation Outage

At the time of writing, PlayStation Network services are down for nearly everything, including account management, gaming, social activities, as well as the PlayStation Store and PlayStation Video. According to notices on the official site, Sony is aware of the issue and is looking into a fix, but the problem has yet to be resolved. Players are voicing frustration all over the internet as the network dropped out in what's gaming primetime for many fans.

Further adding to this frustration is the fact that many single-player games can't be played when the PlayStation Network drops out, even if a player has no intention of using online features for the game. This has become more commonplace in gaming in general, with some PC and Xbox gamers also going through similar problems when their internet goes out, there's a network outage, or DRM-enabled games can't reach their authentication services to ensure that the copy of the game being played is legitimate. In any of these cases, being faced with the notion of not being able to game due to an outage outside fans' control can be extremely irritating.

For now, all PlayStation fans can really do is wait for Sony to issue a fix and get things running again. While some outages in the past have lasted for days, the majority of the time this happens, things get back up and running in a matter of hours. With a little luck, Sony fans will be back online and enjoying their favorite games shortly. In the meantime, it might be time to boot up an older console or try one of a number of games that don't require active wi-fi to play. While many gamers now have additional devices to game on, whether it's a phone, Nintendo Switch, PC, or another device, this outage may nonetheless throw a wrench in some fans' evenings.

Once Sony has restored the PlayStation Network, this post will be updated with further information.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail – The Best Lingsha Light Cone
item.description:
Lingsha

Fire

Abundance

5-Star

Guides

Build Guide

Level-Up Materials

Team Composition

Best Light Cone

Lingsha's best light cone options are crucial for optimizing her performance as a Fire Abundance unit in Honkai: Star Rail . Players may find her to be quite similar to Gallagher at first glance due to the shared path and element, as well as focus on Break Effect - however there are quite some nuances. Generally, her kit benefits significantly from enhancements to Break Effect, ATK, and Energy Regeneration, allowing her to fulfill both healing and offensive support roles within a team. Players will find a variety of premium light cones that align perfectly with her abilities, but there are also plenty of F2P-friendly options that can provide solid alternatives for those working with limited resources.

While Lingsha's current selection of light cones offers a variety of ways to enhance her role, players should keep an eye on future (event-limited) light cones that might bring even more utility. Whether players are looking to prioritize healing, Break Effect, or energy generation, here are the best light cone options for Lingsha that ensures there’s something to suit different needs.

5 Post-Op Conversation

HP

ATK

DEF

1058

423

330

S5 Passive

Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 16% and increases Outgoing Healing when they use their Ultimate by 24%.

Energy Regeneration is a crucial stat for Lingsha, as her Ultimate is one of the most vital aspects of her kit. A max superimposed version of Post-Op Conversation can significantly enhance her ability to consistently activate her Ultimate, by increasing her Energy Regeneration Rate further thereby boosting both her offensive support and healing capabilities.

This is especially important in Break Damage team compositions, where increased activation frequency allows for a damage increase for Break DMG, and it also proves beneficial in Acheron teams, as her Ultimate applies a debuff to enemies. Additionally, teams featuring Feixiao can gain from frequent Ultimate activations, as Fuyuan's actions are advanced, helping her accumulate stacks more quickly. Given these considerations, while Lingsha has access to several viable 4-star Gacha light cone options, Post-Op Conversation stands out as the most beneficial choice for her in this bracket.

4 Night of Fright

HP

ATK

DEF

1164

476

529

S1 Passive

Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to 10% of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by 2.4%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turns(s).

While Night of Fright is primarily recognized as Huohuo's signature light cone, its ability to buff allies, provide consistent healing, and increase Lingsha's Energy Regeneration Rate makes it a solid choice for her as well. However, it may not be as optimal as other premium Abundance light cones on the list that offer more direct synergy with Lingsha’s kit.

Although What is Real is ranked higher than Night of Fright, if players achieve around 200% Break Effect without the need for a dedicated light cone with Break Effect, Night of Fright can actually surpass it in effectiveness due to its additional party-wide buff utility.

3 What is Real?

HP

ATK

DEF

1058

423

330

S5 Passive

Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 48%. After using Basic ATK, restores HP for the wearer by an amount equal to 4% of Max HP plus 800.

If players need extra Break Effect on Lingsha to activate her bonus ability or to surpass the necessary Break Effect for a dedicated team, What is Real? serves as an excellent option, especially as her best F2P light cone. Unfortunately, its utility is somewhat limited, as the secondary passive effect that restores HP only applies to the wearer. While this can enhance Lingsha's own survivability, it isn't particularly impactful since she rarely utilizes her Basic attacks, and it does not provide any benefits to her teammates including passive healing.

2 Echoes of the Coffin

HP

ATK

DEF

1164

582

396

S1 Passive

Increases the wearer's ATK by 24%. After the wearer uses an attack, for each different enemy target the wearer hits, regenerates 3 Energy. Each attack can regenerate Energy up to 3 time(s) this way. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, all allies gain 12 SPD for 1 turn.

Lingsha can effectively utilize Luocha's light cone, Echoes of the Coffin , which has often been considered niche due to the limited number of healers in Honkai: Star Rail that scale with ATK%. However, since Lingsha benefits from ATK%, this light cone becomes a valuable asset for her. The additional effects are also quite advantageous, as each hit she delivers allows her to regenerate energy, enhancing her overall performance.

Moreover, when she activates her Ultimate, all allies gain a boost in Speed, which can be especially helpful in turn-limited combat encounters. Overall, Echoes of the Coffin provides substantial healing potential for Lingsha, even surpassing that of her signature light cone, making it one of her top choices—particularly for players who may not find Luocha as essential in their team compositions anymore.

1 Scent Alone Stays True

HP

ATK

DEF

1058

530

530

S1 Passive

Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%. After the wearer uses Ultimate to attack enemy targets, inflicts the targets with the "Woefree" state, lasting for 2 turn(s). While in "Woefree," enemy targets take 10% increased DMG. The effect of increasing DMG taken is additionally boosted by 8% if the wearer's current Break Effect is 150% or higher.

Interestingly, while "Scent Alone Stays True" is Lingsha's signature light cone and her best option due to the significant Break Effect buff it provides, along with a debuff that increases the damage enemies take, its utility can vary across different team compositions. This makes it somewhat niche, and it may not be the top priority for players focused solely on maximizing their team’s damage output or the healing amount.

However, the debuff feature shines particularly in Acheron teams, where it can amplify overall effectiveness, and characters like Feixiao can also benefit significantly from the considerable 18% DMG taken debuff. Conversely, the increased damage taken is less impactful in Firefly teams, where other aspects of Lingsha’s kit may take precedence.
